name: D S Y C
description:
It doesn't matter who you are!

It doesn't matter what you think!

You can't face this!

D S Y C is a psychological puzzle that challenges you to break down the barriers of the obvious and take into account the details that matter.

D S Y C has been made with Bitsy and is my first published game, so don't hesitate to leave your comments that will help me improve.

Click here if you prefer to play the Spanish version.
